Reviews.Title: Refill my phone right away.
Reviews.Author: Benli Lu
Reviews.Content: Price is real good and very quick.  Just sent a message about my cell number.  I will buy again in the future.

Reviews.Title: It is fast!
Reviews.Author: Lex Luther "LexLuther"
Reviews.Content: Not bad. It is fast and not hassle.But, it actually cost $55 dollars.That $50 dollars was applied the next day though.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Daniel
Reviews.Content: Great for all my needs, lives up to my expectations. I am very happy with this product. Highly recommend you buy this.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Steven Bishop
Reviews.Content: Great Value,  got it very fast! These are the same ones that dealers sell for over $50. Strongly recommended card

Reviews.Title: I am a regular customer of this store
Reviews.Author: Xia S.
Reviews.Content: I am a regular customer of this store. The storekeeper handwrite the envelop, and is amiable to me. The key reason I choose this store is the price is so attractive for me. The cheapest, the best.

Reviews.Title: Ms. Bea
Reviews.Author: Ms. B
Reviews.Content: I love this item. It was shipped right on time. The price should have been a little bit cheaper ($5.00).

Reviews.Title: T-Mobile Refill Card
Reviews.Author: czechlynn
Reviews.Content: I chose 5 stars because the refill arrived promptly thru the mail. I was not happen or I should say...surprised that it was a sheet of letter paper and not an actual card as in the stores. And yes I would advise anyone to purchase a refill card online thru Amazon. It was effortless! Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Cheaper other places
Reviews.Author: Brent Martin
Reviews.Content: If you Go to walmarts website and search tmobile prepaid card they have a better deal. They have electronic delivery and its only $49.54 for a $50 card.
